name: WidescreenReview
0:
”Alexa, ask widescreen review for the picture review of Darkest Hour.”
”Alexa, ask widescreen review for the sound review of Logan.”
”Alexa, ask widescreen review for the Dumb and Dumber review.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: widescreen review
des: Get picture and sound quality reviews for Blu-ray Discs and 4K UltraHD Blu-ray Discs as reviewed on WidescreenReview.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
